meta.description: Maximize the data flow from the data center (Point 0) to the user hub (Point 5) without exceeding line capacities.

sets.name: POINTS
sets.description: Key points in the telecommunications network.

params.name: capacity
params.description: Capacity of data lines between points in GB/s.

vars.name: flow
vars.description: Data flow between points in GB/s.

objective.name: max_data_flow
objective.description: Maximize the data flow from Point 0 to Point 5.

constraints.name: capacity_constraint_0_1
constraints.description: Flow from Point 0 to Point 1 does not exceed capacity.
